subject: Re: blue lighting
author: seanjankowski1
full_text:
Strangely enough I have, but it was many years ago. I was a teenager
when it happened. I was at my grandmothers house when I saw a soft
green like glow illuminating one of the rooms in the hall in the
middle of the night. It was a very soft glow but enough to catch my
attention. I thought someone had left on a TV or that something was
flashing in the room like a clock radio but as I went to investigate
the room the light stopped glowing and I never saw it again. 

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Andrea Carr" <fairlia@...> wrote:
>
> Hi All,
> 
> I am Andrea Carr who is a 41 year old wife and mom of 1 daughter. I
am sorry I have not written before but I have a terrible year and
haven't had the time to concentrate on EVP like I had prior. I won't
get into the details but it has left me in the midst of OK just trying
to pull through all of this BS & I will get back to it when I can.
> 
> Unfortunatley I am leaving for the weekend tomorrow morning and
won't see my e-mails until Monday morning. 
> 
> I have a question for any one here. I believe in aliens, spirit and
ghost communications via evp but tonight I had an experience I never
had before.
> 
> I woke up at exactly 2:22 by my stove's clock and went and cleaned
my sink of dishes while I heated up some cream chipped beef (albiet
not too exciting) but while I sat there after in the dark with my
family sleeping my hallway ilummating a light clored blue several
times. Anyone else ever seen this?
> 
> I look forward to any responses.
> 
> Thanks!
> Andrea
>
